Accounts Create a new account Add an existing account Delete Account Are you sure to delete the account?
Do you want to switch to ? Delete Account Finger authentication Authentication error Select type Activate Your verification code is sent to %s Enter your name Enter your mail Enter your password Please choice your account type,we will use it for better teachers selection Verify Enter promo code first
Current packages Here you will see the remaining minutes in all your current packages Teacher List You can search for your preferred teacher Teacher List You can search for your preferred teacher Direct Call You can call the best available teacher directly with one click You can call the best available teacher directly with one click Subscribe To A New Package Ran out of minutes?\nDon\'t worry, subscribe to a new package anytime from here
Call A Teacher Call A Teacher You can call any teacher (Audio or Video) while he is available You can call any teacher (Audio or Video) while she is available There are three statuses for every teacher,\n- Online/ Available (Green): the teacher is available and you can call him.\n- Busy (red): the teacher is currently in a call with another student.\n- Offline/ Not Available (Gray): the teacher is not available now for receiving calls from any student. There are three statuses for every teacher,\n- Online/ Available (Green): the teacher is available and you can call her.\n- Busy (red): the teacher is currently in a call with another student.\n- Offline/ Not Available (Gray): the teacher is not available now for receiving calls from any student.
Select the suitable package for you Here, you can see the package details, and the package discount if exists,\n every package has its expiration duration and the minutes that you will receive after buying it. e.g (60 minutes / 1 month) means this package will give you 60 minutes valid for one month. If you have a discount code, you can type it here then press apply to activate your discount. Here, you will see the total amount you will pay after deducting all discounts if exist. Custom Package! If you have a custom package code, you can type it here then press apply to activate your package.
Manage Dependents Add a new dependent Here, you will see all distributed minutes to all dependents. Here, you can add/retrieve minutes to/from the selected dependents, or delete the selected dependents
Balance Transfer Select the package to transfer the minutes from it. Type the minutes count to transfer, or select all remaining balance to transfer all available minutes from the selected package. Optionally, type a comment to be sent with the transferred minutes Search for any registered user by his username, or any other user (even if not register) by his email or phone number. Add the selected user to the beneficiaries list to be able to transfer the minutes to him Here you can see your total balance after the transfer Here you can see the list of users to whom the transferred minutes will be divided equally Payment has been successful and your order is being processed, the reference number is Payment Error %s Payment cancelled The payment has been finished successfully, and the package added to your balance Renew automatically No session available Auto renew Cancel the auto renew
Your order is being processed Select payment method Use this mobile with STC Pay Select plan part Select plan surah No plans found Add new plan Do you want to delete Plan path? Do you want to delete Plan ? Order: Pages you can save at a time: Session type Do you want to complete your plan or make normal education session? Please select plan path We are glad to hear your voice. Would you like to help you build your plan? Teacher categories
Sorry, you can\'t select paths from different plans
ٍSelect rating stars Rate Us Thanks for rating us,do you want to rate us on play store also? Enjoying Moddakir Complete your registration now! Complete the registration process now, simple steps to join the Madker family and start the journey of memorizing the Holy Quran. Register with us now! Take your first step now and register with us to join the Madker family and start the journey of memorizing the Holy Quran. Press to return to the previous screen Change language button to Arabic Press to sign in with your Google account Press to sign in with your Twitter account Press to sign in with your Facebook account Press to sign in instead of creating a new account Press to sign in instead of creating a new account Press to sign up using your email and password Press to sign in using your fingerprint Press to complete the sign in process Press to open the forgot password screen Press to open the forgot password screen Press to open the sign in screen Press to go to the next screen Press to open the sign up screen Press to cancel the sign up process Press to send your request Press to reset your password by your email Press to reset your password by your phone number Press to verify the code Press to call the teacher with an audio call Press to call the teacher with a video call Teacher rating Press to search for a teacher by his name "Press to open the filter options Press to hide the filter popup Press to clear all filters Press to select the nationality Press to select the language Press to select the Ejaza Press to select the category press to delete session press to report teacher press to share press to add your comment press to show more Show more press to Add Dependent Tap a start to rate us Write A Comment Welcome to the\nQuickBird Studios\nHealth Survey Get ready for a bunch of super random questions! Let\'s go! Done! Thanks for taking the survey, we will contact you soon! Submit survey skip here. Survey Are you sure you want to quit the survey? Video Call Voice call Reserve Date

Unlimited Unlimited Thank you for choosing the open package 💚
- Unlimited minutes / for a month - Dedicated to a single user - It does not support adding followers, or transferring credit 0 Part Scholarship for indigent students You can send minutes as a scholarship for indigent students to help them learn the Qur’an Amount of memorized Quran Account details Customer language Professional status Age group path Parts Memorized use Moddakir Session type Reply type Teacher\'s Compatibility The teacher is being reached Please enter your password to confirm deletion of the account: The account will be deleted directly, and you will lose your booked sessions, subscriptions, recorded session and the teacher\'s comments on the interactive holy Quran. Warning: A record of any violations will be retained, if the user registered again with the same email the previous sanctions will be as is. Freezed Freezed active active consumed expired refunded

The teacher\'s calmness and attentiveness style and interaction with me What is your opinion of the teacher attention to my mistakes and correcting A comment for the teacher Type here What do you think of the call quality and internet connection Email (optional) Specify the number of hours you want to donate: Do you want to donate educational minutes? Write the number of minutes you want to donate. Educational gifts Contribute to teaching the Quran to orphans! You can provide educational grants to contribute to teaching the Holy Quran to orphans. Provide educational gifts Total grants Grant amount Number of recipients date Benefit percentage grant details The beneficiaries This educational grant Provided in collaboration with The Specialized Sub-Council for Orphanages in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia aims to facilitate Quranic learning for orphans through an initiative providing educational grants. Orphans can learn the Quran through the Muddakir app Share the reward with us Contribute to teaching the Holy Quran to orphans Another amount Write the amount you wish Educational grant Total donation Number of beneficiaries Character read Number of countries People Letter The purchase has been successfully cancelled The purchase hasn\'t been successfully cancelled Please select the checkbox below to proceed I\\\'m not a robot Please verify that you are not a robot Benefiting Benefit completed there\'s no beneficiaries until now SAR Do you want to contribute to teaching the Quran? Share the reward and contribute to providing educational grants to facilitate Quran learning for orphans through the Mudakir app, in collaboration with the Specialized Subsidiary Council of Orphan Associations in Saudi Arabia. مساعدة المسلمين على تلاوة كتاب ربهم حق تلاوته.\n تقديم أنموذج تعليم قرآني إلكتروني فعال يلائم الفئات المختلفة.\n تخريج حفاظ وحافظات لكتاب الله مجازين بالسند المتصل.\n

Pages Do you want to read Step 2 of 2 Juz %s Juz From juz: From juz %s To juz %s To juz: From %s To %s %s %s Quarter Half Done Get to know moddakir Words \n errors tajweed \n errors Words errors: tajweed errors: Hesitation: Hesitation Number of aspects: Hesitation last sessions Plan details cancel information \n session information Answered, Calling is in progress… Press to reset your password Statistics Total: Sorry, the call has been interrupted by the teacher please wait a while for reconnecting the call or hang up the call now Sorry, the call has been interrupted by the student please wait a while for reconnecting the call or hang up the call now open share screen close share screen List Of book Start screen sharing Do you want to share your screen with the student? Files File Viewer Please Enable the additional permissions You will not receive notifications while the app is in background if you disable these permissions Session preferences Your teacher will be notified and may be able to accommodate your preferences Your preferences are built based on the last education session, go straight to the Save Session Preferences button if you don\'t want to edit anything Reading path Recitation is your default choice based on your path in the memory. You can change the path of your readers Recitation Recite Read and Ejaza Reading Type Tajweed Hadr - Fast Reading How quickly will the teacher respond? After Alarm After Mistakes End of session Save session preferences Reading the Noble Qur’an calmly and correctly, while observing the provisions of Tajweed Reading the Noble Qur’an quickly without stressing the provisions of Tajweed Select your plan Please select teacher response Please select reading type My educational preferences Filling out this information will help you develop your educational experience and facilitate access to the right Qur’an teacher for you. The age group you belong to The educational path to be learned You can combine Recitation and Recite as two paths Hearing a verse from the teacher, then reading it and repeating it to thepoint of mastery Correcting obvious errors and intonation rulings by looking at the Qur’an Correcting obvious errors and intonation rulings by reciting from the memory This path is for those who have mastered the Noble Qur’an and would like to offerto recite it or take an Ejaza Save My Preferences Reading and recitation level> A new and inexperienced class in learning the Qur’an> A class that has some experience in learning the Qur’an and needs moreexperience A class with high experience in learning the Noble Qur’an Teacher\'s favorite language Multiple choice Student preferences Reading type Response speed Normal session Session On Plan Plan There are no calls
For Yourself "For Your Child Both Using the app for? Parts Teacher\'s Preferences It is a service that helps determine who are the right students for you Educational Path Multiple choice, The sum should be 100% Learning by reading the verse to the student and then hearing it from him, and this is repeated until the student masters the pronunciation of the verse correctly Correcting obvious errors and intonation rulings, bearing in mind that the student reads by looking at the Qur’an Correcting obvious errors and intonation rulings, bearing in mind that the student is reciting from his memory This path is for those who have mastered the Noble Qur’an and would like to offer to recite it or take an Ejaza" Reading and recitation level The age group to be taught A teacher that matches your desires A teacher who will fulfill your desires A teacher with different preferences your desires
Teacher matches your educational desires Teacher fulfill your educational desires Teacher with different preferences educational desires
